text: (Is mauqe par Allah unse puchega ke) “Aey giroh e Jinn o Ins, kya tumhare paas khud tumhi mein se woh paigambar nahi aaye thay jo tumko meri aayat sunate aur is din ke anjaam se darate thay?” Woh kahenge “haan, hum apne khilaf khud gawahi dete hain”. Aaj duniya ki zindagi ne in logon ko dhoke mein daal raakha hai, magar us waqt woh khud apne khilaf gawahi denge ke woh kafir thay
